compounddef.title: UsdShaders : Definitions and Implementations of Usd* Shader Nodes

sect1.title: Overview
sect1.para: This library houses the definitions and implementations for all the current (and future) "Usd*" shader nodes, eg. UsdPreviewSurface, UsdUVTexture etc.

The definitions are represented by a UsdShade-based shader definition file. See UsdShade Based Shader Definition. It currently only contains "glslfx" implementations for the hydra GL backend. In the (not-too-distant) future, it will contain "oso" files that provide OSL implementations of the Usd* shaders.
In addition to shader definitions and implementations, this library may also provide Usd schemas for robust authoring and querying of shader properties in the future.
